resources.string: This is an application to record audio.\n\nTo start recording press \"Record\" button, to stop recording press \"Stop\" button.

A fun interactive application that helps you open apps on your device with the help of your voice!
Not just this,you can also record and store your voice onto the device.
So,Talk it out!!

Directions:
1. Enable interent connection facility on your device
2. Enable Voice recognition system of the device
3. operate the app in a quiet environment


Developers: 
G. Bhagya Lakshmi
Rashmi Gupta
Anupama Jayaprakash
